tasks.label: cmake: check configuration
tasks.command: if (-not (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/build/default/build/CMakeCache.txt')) { Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'ERROR: CMake is not configured!' -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'Please configure the project first by selecting a CMake preset:' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host '  1. Open Command Palette (Ctrl+Shift+P)' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host '  2. Run: CMake: Select Configure Preset' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host '  3. Choose: windows-vs2026' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'Or run in terminal:' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host '  cmake --preset windows-vs2026' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host ''; exit 1 }
